title: (x) Script sample - Amethyst Script {Josh (self)}
content:
Can someone help me ID this typeface? Possibly a Veer font?

Thanks

Josh

comments.content:
nevermind, found it...

It’s Amethyst Script  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/amethyst-script/amethyst-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122402/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/amethyst-script/amethyst-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/amethyst-script/amethyst-script/")

Have you looked over at [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122402/http:/www.veer.com/)? They have a fierce collection of [scripts](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122402/http:/www.veer.com/search/results.aspx?producttype=typ&clarify=false&keyword=script+or+handwriting+or+calligraphic+or+calligraphy).
